topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Post-Installation Tasks

body.p: After HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade is fully installed and deployed, perform the tasks in this section.

section.title: Verify the VSC VMs
section.p: The installation process creates virtual machines for VSC. VSC VMs are installed and are operational.

section.title: Verify the VRS-G Node
section.p: The installation creates a VRS-G node as part of the cloud deployment. Use the following command to verify that the VRS-G is active.

section.title: Verify LDAP
section.p: You should verify that LDAP is functioning correctly.
For more information, see Verifying the LDAP Deployment

section.title: Provision Baremetal Nodes for the Sacramento Deployment
section.p: If you are installing the sacramento template, which includes the KVM region, the baremetal region, ESX storage, and uses HPE DCN VRS networking, follow these instructions to provision baremetal nodes.
For more information, see Provision Baremetal Nodes for the Sacramento Deployment.

body.section:
Configure a 5930 Switch to Support PCI-PT/SR-IOV/Baremetal Ports This document provides a sequence of events to understand how VMs with vNIC type PCI-PT or SRIOV is orchestrated to provide:
IP assignment to the vNICs from the tenant network pool
vNICs are part of VSD managed subnet (VxLAN segment) to allow communication between a VM with virtio vNIC, a VM with SRIOV vNIC and a VM with PCI-PT vNIC in the same l2 domain.
For more information, see: Configuring 5930 Switch to Support PCI-PT/SR-IOV/Baremetal Ports
